tool.name: GATE Gazetteer v2.3.0
tool.help:
**What it does**
Adds entity annotations to names found in a pre-defined gazetteer, or recognized using pattern matching rules. See the `GATE documentation <https://gate.ac.uk/sale/tao/splitch6.html#x9-1320006.3>`_ for more information.
**Required Annotations**
* Tokens with `Penn part of speech tags <https://www.ling.upenn.edu/courses/Fall_2003/ling001/penn_treebank_pos.html>`_ in GATE XML format (will automatically convert from LIF)
**Generated Annotations**
* Various named entity annotations in `GATE XML format <https://gate.ac.uk/sale/tao/splitch5.html#x8-1000005.5.2>`_.
.. class:: warningmark
The output of all GATE tools is in `GATE XML format <https://gate.ac.uk/sale/tao/splitch5.html#x8-1000005.5.2>`_. This output can be input directly into other GATE tools. To input GATE XML format to tools requiring LIF, use *Convert formats->GateToLif*
**License**
This tool is adapted from the `General Architecture for Text Engineering (GATE) platform <http:gate.ac.uk>`_, which is released under the `GNU Lesser General Public License 3.0 <https://www.gnu.org/licenses/lgpl-3.0.html>`_
